S10ekottaru:570_2: sāvaśeṣāṃ niravaśeṣataḥ niravaśeṣāṃ sāvaśeṣataḥ ācīrṇām anācīrṇataḥ anācīrṇām ācīrṇataḥ

S10ekottaru:570_6: vinayaṃ ca vinayataḥ āpattim āpattitaḥ anāpattim anāpattitaḥ gurvīṃ gurutaḥ laghvīṃ
S10ekottaru:570_7: laghutaḥ sāvaseṣāṃ sāvaśeṣataḥ niravaśeṣāṃ niravaśeṣataḥ ācīrṇām ācīrṇataḥ anācīrṇām
S10ekottaru:570_8: anācīrṇataḥ abhāṣitām abhāṣitataḥ bhāṣitāṃ ca bhāṣitataḥ apraṇihitām apraṇihitataḥ
S10ekottaru:570_9: praṇihitāṃ praṇihitataḥ aprajñaptām aprajñaptataḥ prajñaptāṃ prajñaptataḥ asamavahatām
